net.explorviz.shared.security

Class TokenBasedSecurityContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.explorviz.shared.security.TokenBasedSecurityContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext

    public class TokenBasedSecurityContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext
    Custom SecurityContext that holds security details for the authorization process. See @AuthenticationFilter and AuthorizationFilter for examples.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface javax.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext

        BASIC_AUTH, CLIENT_CERT_AUTH, DIGEST_AUTH, FORM_AUTH

    • Constructor Detail

      • TokenBasedSecurityContext

        public TokenBasedSecurityContext(AuthenticatedUserDetails authenticatedUserDetails,
                                 TokenDetails authenticationTokenDetails,
                                 boolean secure)
        Constructor for this custom SecurityContext.
        Parameters:
        authenticatedUserDetails - - Contains details of an authenticated user, e.g., the roles
        authenticationTokenDetails - - Java model of the JSON web token for this user
        secure - - A boolean indicating whether this request was made using a secure channel, such as HTTPS.
